allow: Bash(sleep 1 ./tmux -S /tmp/t1 -f/dev/null new-session -d -x40 -y10 ./tmux -S /tmp/t1 split-window -W sleep 1 ./tmux -S /tmp/t1 send-keys 'seq 1 18' Enter sleep 2 echo "Positions:" ./tmux -S /tmp/t1 list-panes -F '#{pane_id} #{pane_panorama_role} at x=#{pane_left}' echo "" echo "LEFT \(slave\):" ./tmux -S /tmp/t1 capture-pane -t %1 -p)

Bash(__NEW_LINE__ echo "Test 1: Enter/exit less multiple times...")
Bash(__NEW_LINE__ echo "=== Test: Alternate screen \(less\) cycles ===")

Bash(# Exit copy mode first ./tmux -S /tmp/panorama-test send-keys -t %1 q # Check history size on master''s screen echo ""=== Display pane info ==="" ./tmux -S /tmp/panorama-test display -t %0 -p ''master history=#{history_size} scroll_position=#{scroll_position}'' ./tmux -S /tmp/panorama-test display -t %1 -p ''slave history=#{history_size} scroll_position=#{scroll_position}'' # Enter copy mode on slave and check history echo """" echo ""=== Enter copy mode on slave ==="" ./tmux -S /tmp/panorama-test copy-mode -t %1 sleep 0.2 ./tmux -S /tmp/panorama-test display -t %1 -p ''slave in copy mode, history=#{history_size}'' # Try scrolling with arrow keys echo """" echo ""=== Before scroll up ==="" ./tmux -S /tmp/panorama-test capture-pane -t %1 -p)

Bash(# Exit slave copy mode ./tmux -S /tmp/panorama-test send-keys -t %1 q sleep 0.2 # Enter copy mode on MASTER and test scrolling echo ""=== Enter copy mode on MASTER ==="" ./tmux -S /tmp/panorama-test copy-mode -t %0 sleep 0.2 ./tmux -S /tmp/panorama-test display -t %0 -p ''master in copy mode, history=#{history_size}'' echo """" echo ""=== Master before scroll ==="" ./tmux -S /tmp/panorama-test capture-pane -t %0 -p)

Bash(# Exit copy mode ./tmux -S /tmp/panorama-test send-keys -t %0 q sleep 0.2 # Capture with scrollback history echo ""=== Master pane with full history \(capture-pane -S -\) ==="" ./tmux -S /tmp/panorama-test capture-pane -t %0 -p -S -)

Bash(# Exit current copy mode ./tmux -S /tmp/panorama-test send-keys -t %0 q sleep 0.2 # Check mode-keys setting \(vi vs emacs\) ./tmux -S /tmp/panorama-test show-options -g mode-keys || echo ""mode-keys not set"" # Enter copy mode and use k to go up \(works in both vi and emacs mode\) ./tmux -S /tmp/panorama-test copy-mode -t %0 sleep 0.2 echo ""=== Before moving cursor ==="" ./tmux -S /tmp/panorama-test capture-pane -t %0 -p)

Bash(# Exit slave copy mode ./tmux -S /tmp/panorama-test send-keys -t %1 q sleep 0.2 # Try copy mode on MASTER pane ./tmux -S /tmp/panorama-test copy-mode -t %0 sleep 0.2 echo ""=== Master pane initial position ==="" ./tmux -S /tmp/panorama-test capture-pane -t %0 -p)

Bash(# Try different approaches to scroll in copy mode # First check if in copy mode ./tmux -S /tmp/normal-test list-panes -F ''#{pane_id} in_mode=#{pane_in_mode}'' # Exit and re-enter copy mode ./tmux -S /tmp/normal-test send-keys q sleep 0.2 ./tmux -S /tmp/normal-test copy-mode sleep 0.2 echo ""=== Display scroll position ==="" ./tmux -S /tmp/normal-test display -p ''scroll_position=#{scroll_position} history=#{history_size}'' # Try halfpage-up \(M-v in emacs mode\) echo """" echo ""=== After M-v \(page-up\) ==="" ./tmux -S /tmp/normal-test send-keys M-v sleep 0.3 ./tmux -S /tmp/normal-test display -p ''scroll_position=#{scroll_position}'' ./tmux -S /tmp/normal-test capture-pane -p)
